str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

str2: To lend; mid: I borrow. From daneion; to loan on interest; reflexively, to borrow.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.

str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

Equal, equivalent, identical. Probably from eido; similar.
